page.title: 14DURDLE DOOR CARAVAN PARK
page.content: The{DURDLE DOOR CARAVAN PARK}is owned by the WELD ESTATE.It is open from the third week in March to the 15th October. Mr Diffy,who was the tenant farmer at Newlands Farm,started the Camping Site back in the 1930's.In 1936,the Weld Estate took it over and built 14 chalets.It was closed during the War. In 1950,the chalets were removed and replaced by caravans.There are now about 450.Some are owned by the Estate but the majority are privately owned. There is also an area for about 200 tents and 25 touring vans. A new complex was opened in 1984, with a Shop,Bar and Fish & Chip Shop.
